## Shortcut for Nested JSON Objects

``` js
var listsOfItems = [
  {
    name: "list01",
    items: [
      {
        "id": 1,
      },
    ],
  },
]
``` 

Short form to define this data structure:

``` 
listsOfItems :: [{name, items:[{id}]}]
```
